name: backbone-v14-project-suite
description: Complete BACKBONE v14.2 project suite including web app, licensing website, and deployment infrastructure
author: chebacca

scripts.dev: echo 'Starting both projects in development mode...' && ./dev-unified.sh
scripts.build: echo 'Building both projects...' && cd Dashboard-v14_2/apps/web && npm run build && cd ../../dashboard-v14-licensing-website\ 2 && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploying to Firebase...' && firebase deploy --only hosting,functions
scripts.deploy:web: echo 'Deploying web app...' && firebase deploy --only hosting:backbone-client
scripts.deploy:licensing: echo 'Deploying licensing website...' && firebase deploy --only hosting:backbone-logic
